backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing a tic-tac-toe backend with game state logic including win detection, tie detection, and score counting. Exposes an `updateGameState` async function that returns a `Features` record with field state, player characters, and points.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the fullscreen button feature, listing the files it touches, component dependencies, and test IDs with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: A JSON document containing short summaries of each frontend source file, describing their purpose and key implementation details for build planning reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base CSS defining OKLCH-based design tokens for light and dark themes, including colors for background, foreground, card, sidebar, chart, and destructive states.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the TickTaskTime app, loading the Quicksand font from Google Fonts and mounting the React app via `/src/main.tsx`.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app component that composes all providers (query, router, alerts, sounds, music, backgrounds), renders the stable media layer, timer tabs, floating action buttons (play and fullscreen), and a settings panel. Includes an error boundary and a timer overlay for fullscreen mode.
frontend/src/branding.ts: Single-export module defining the `APP_NAME` constant as `'TickTaskTime'` for use across the app.
frontend/src/features/alerts/alertSounds: Defines alert sound options (off, beep, chime, bell, custom) and provides a `playAlertSound` utility that uses the Web Audio API for built-in tones and supports custom URLs including YouTube links.
frontend/src/features/alerts/TimerAlertS: Settings card UI for timer alerts, allowing users to enable/disable alerts, select a completion sound (built-in or custom), and preview the selected sound.
frontend/src/features/alerts/TimerAlerts: React context provider managing timer alert state (enabled flag, selected sound) with localStorage persistence, and exposing `notifyCompletion` and `previewSound` callbacks that play audio and show toast notifications.
frontend/src/features/backgrounds/Backgr: React component that provides a UI for setting a background via file upload, direct URL, or YouTube URL, with controls for brightness, volume, and timer overlay toggle.
Floating button component that toggles browser fullscreen mode on the background stage element, only rendered when an active background exists.
Floating play/pause button rendered only when a video or YouTube background is active and not in fullscreen, delegating toggle logic to the background context.
React context provider that wraps the `useBackground` hook, exposes background state and actions to child components, and handles blob URL cleanup on background changes.
Renders the active background (image, video, or YouTube) as a full-screen stage, managing play/pause via context state, spacebar keyboard shortcut, and error handling for each media type.
frontend/src/features/backgrounds/loadYo: Loads the YouTube IFrame Player API script exactly once and returns a shared promise that resolves when the API is ready. Also declares global TypeScript types for the YT player interface.
frontend/src/features/backgrounds/mediaS: Provides utility functions for inferring media type from MIME types or URLs, validating URLs, generating error messages, and probing whether a URL loads as an image or video.
frontend/src/features/backgrounds/useBac: Custom React hook that manages background state (image, video, or YouTube) including persistence to localStorage, boot-time validation of stored backgrounds, and controls for brightness, volume, and playback.
frontend/src/features/backgrounds/YouTub: Memoized component that initializes and manages a YouTube IFrame API player sized to cover the viewport, supporting play/pause control, volume adjustment, looping, and error reporting.
frontend/src/features/backgrounds/youtub: Parses various YouTube URL formats to extract a video ID and builds an optimized YouTube embed URL with autoplay, loop, and JS API parameters for background playback.
frontend/src/features/music/MusicProvide: React context provider that exposes the useMusic hook's state and actions (source URL, type, volume, controls) to the component tree via useMusicContext.
frontend/src/features/music/MusicSetting: UI component for configuring music playback, allowing users to input a Spotify, Apple Music, or direct audio URL and adjust volume via a slider.
frontend/src/features/music/MusicStage.t: Renders the appropriate audio output element—a hidden HTML audio element for direct audio, or off-screen iframes for Spotify and Apple Music embeds—and manages audio playback lifecycle.
frontend/src/features/music/musicSupport: Parses music URLs to classify them as Spotify, Apple Music, direct audio, or unknown, and converts share links into embeddable URLs for each supported service.
frontend/src/features/music/useMusic.ts: Custom React hook that manages music playback state (source URL, type, embed URL, volume) with localStorage persistence and an audio element ref for direct audio control.
frontend/src/features/navigation/Navigat: Settings UI component that displays instructions for drag-to-reorder navigation tabs and provides a button to reset the tab order to its default.
frontend/src/features/navigation/navigat: Defines the NavigationTabId type, tab definitions, default order array, and a helper to look up a tab's label by ID.
frontend/src/features/navigation/Reorder: Navigation tab bar component that supports pointer-based drag-and-drop reordering of tabs via a grip handle, updating the order on drop.
frontend/src/features/navigation/useNavi: Custom hook that loads, persists, and exposes the navigation tab order from localStorage, with normalization to handle missing or duplicate entries.
frontend/src/features/publishShare/Publi: Sheet component that displays the current URL for sharing, with copy-to-clipboard and open-in-new-tab actions, and a warning when running inside an embedded preview iframe.
frontend/src/features/publishShare/useIs: Hook that detects whether the app is running inside an iframe by comparing window.self to window.top, returning true if embedded.
frontend/src/features/reminders/Reminder: Headless component that polls reminders every 10 seconds and triggers a notification via the alerts system when a reminder's due date has passed.
UI component for managing reminders, providing dialogs to add and edit reminders with a title and datetime, and displaying them sorted by due date with delete and edit actions.
frontend/src/features/reminders/useRemin: Custom hook that manages a list of reminders in localStorage, exposing add, update, and delete operations with stable callbacks.
frontend/src/features/sounds/CustomSound: React context provider that manages custom sounds state, persisting to localStorage and exposing methods to add (by URL or file), update, remove, reorder, and preview sounds with toast notifications.
frontend/src/features/sounds/customSound: Utility module for persisting custom sounds to localStorage with size/count limits, plus helpers for ID generation, file-to-data-URL conversion, and audio file validation.
frontend/src/features/sounds/SoundCustom: UI panel component for managing custom sounds, supporting add/edit/delete via dialogs, file upload or URL input, and drag-and-drop or button-based reordering.
frontend/src/features/sounds/useSoundPan: Custom hook that persists and toggles the sound panel's visibility state in localStorage.
frontend/src/features/sounds/youtubeSoun: Module that plays audio from YouTube URLs using the IFrame API in a hidden player, with auto-stop after a configurable duration and full cleanup on stop.
frontend/src/features/timers/countdown/C: Countdown timer card component with editable hours/minutes/seconds inputs, play/pause/reset controls, and completion notification via TimerAlertsProvider.
frontend/src/features/timers/countdown/u: Custom hook managing countdown timer state (duration, time left, running status) with accurate interval ticking, pause/resume support, localStorage persistence, and an onComplete callback.
frontend/src/features/timers/interval/In: React component rendering an interval timer card with work/rest display, play/pause/reset/skip controls, and configurable settings for interval durations and rounds.
frontend/src/features/timers/interval/us: Custom hook managing interval timer state (work/rest intervals, rounds, countdown) with localStorage persistence, accurate tick logic, and start/pause/reset/skip controls.
frontend/src/features/timers/navigation/: React component providing drag-and-drop reorderable timer navigation tabs using pointer events, with animated tab shifting and click-vs-drag detection.
Defines the list of available timer modes with their IDs and labels, the default tab order, and a helper to look up a mode's label by ID.
Small settings UI component that displays instructions for reordering timer tabs and provides a button to reset the tab order to default.
Custom hook that loads, persists, and normalizes the timer tab order from localStorage, with deduplication and missing-mode backfill logic.
frontend/src/features/timers/pomodoro/Po: React component rendering a Pomodoro timer card with segment display, play/pause/reset/skip controls, and configurable work, short break, and long break durations.
frontend/src/features/timers/pomodoro/us: Custom hook managing Pomodoro timer state including work/break segment cycling, completed pomodoro count, localStorage persistence, and accurate countdown logic.
frontend/src/features/timers/repeating/R: React component rendering a repeating timer card with play/pause/reset controls, a time display, completed repeat count, and settings for duration and repeat count including an infinite mode toggle.
frontend/src/features/timers/repeating/u: Custom hook managing repeating timer state (start, pause, reset, cycle counting) with localStorage persistence and an optional onComplete callback when all cycles finish.
frontend/src/features/timers/shared/Anim: SVG component rendering two concentric animated arc rings representing seconds (outer) and minutes (inner) progress, with tick marks and a moving dot indicator.
frontend/src/features/timers/shared/Edit: Controlled numeric text input component that syncs with an external value, clamps input on blur, and supports keyboard confirmation and cancellation.
frontend/src/features/timers/shared/Minu: Composite input component that splits a total-seconds value into separate minutes and seconds EditableNumberInput fields and recombines them on change.
frontend/src/features/timers/shared/Rota: Draggable rotary dial component that maps pointer/touch drag angle to a numeric value within a min/max range, displaying the current value with a rotating indicator dot.
frontend/src/features/timers/shared/time: Utility functions to format a total-seconds value into HH:MM:SS or MM:SS strings, and milliseconds into a similar format with centisecond precision.
frontend/src/features/timers/shared/useA: Custom hook that sets up a setInterval with a stable callback ref, only running when the `running` flag is true and clearing on cleanup.
frontend/src/features/timers/stopwatch/S: React component rendering a stopwatch UI card with start/pause, reset, and lap recording controls, displaying elapsed time and a scrollable lap history.
frontend/src/features/timers/stopwatch/u: Custom hook managing stopwatch state (elapsed time, running status, laps) with start, pause, reset, and lap recording actions using an accurate interval.
frontend/src/features/timers/visibility/: Fixed bottom toolbar component displaying a wall clock and toggle controls for timer visibility, music, alerts, settings, and sharing.
Fixed top-left clock component that displays the current time and hides itself when an active background (image, video, or YouTube) is set.
Custom hook managing timer panel visibility and two toggle states (music, alerts), persisting values to localStorage/sessionStorage and auto-hiding the timer when a background is active.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, invalidating dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and provider, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status via a React context and custom hook.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet configuring Tailwind base/components/utilities, defining light and dark CSS custom properties for the design system, and adding drag-animation utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/safeStorage.ts: Utility wrapping localStorage and sessionStorage with error handling and an in-memory fallback, exposing safe get, set, and remove operations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the frontend, extending the default theme with custom fonts (Quicksand), OKLCH-based color tokens, border radii, a glow box shadow, accordion animations, and enabling the tailwindcss-animate and @tailwindcss/typography plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks the current state of the TickTaskTime project at schema version 1.0.0, recording existing features (fullscreen button toggle) and a pending new feature request (AR-1) to add a fullscreen background button.
